Title: Frost VFX Edit
Description: Frost spell effects touch up!

Title: NPCs Take Cover - Smarter Anti-Cheese AI
Description: This mod makes NPCs smarter and capable of dealing with the most cheesy strategy Skyrim has ever seen: shooting NPCs from locations they cannot reach. They will now hide properly and relocate if necessary, while also shaming you for using dirty tactics (with 200+ voiced reactions!)

Title: Open Animation Replacer
Description: A SKSE framework plugin that replaces animations depending on configurable conditions. In-game editor. Backwards compatible with more features. Extensible by other SKSE plugins. Supports SE/AE/VR. Open source.

Title: Paired Animation Improvements
Description: A SKSE plugin that lets annotated events in paired animations work like in normal animations. Also causes the game to create synchronized animation bindings on demand, freeing up a few hundred animation slots for use by animation replacers. Supports SE/AE/VR. Open source.

Title: Ysmir Armor SE
Description: New unique heavy armor. Комплект уникальной тяжёлой брони.

Title: Animated Carriage
Description: NPCs now travel by carriage on the road.

Title: Nordic Winds
Description: Utilizes Sound Record Distributor to replace regional wind loops with more unique varieties. FOMOD installer included.

Title: Backported Extended ESL Support
Description: Adds support for the extended plugin (ESL) range introduced in game version 1.6.1130 to versions 1.5.97, 1.6.659, and anything in between.

Title: Animated Carriage Additional Route
Description: This mod adds more routes for animated carriage mod for more immersion!

Title: Dark Witch Armor BHUNP 3BA SMP
Description: Adds a female only gothic-styled dress with medieval armor to the game. Light armor. BHUNP support. SMP enabled for the skirt. Optional 4k textures. ESPFE.

Title: Wildwood Echoes
Description: Utilizes Sound Record Distributor to place new ambient sounds in the forests of Skyrim. Including (but not limited to) many natural tree sounds, wind gusts, frogs croaking, wolves howling, distant dogs barking, and more!

Title: Stacks of Septims - 3d Coin Piles
Description: 3D coin piles

Title: Dialogue Expansion - Windhelm
Description: Hello! This mod adds 700+ lore-friendly lines of dialogue to the existing residents of Windhelm (about 30 NPCS are modified). NPCS were given major dialogue overhauls so as to really represent the sterile, hostile nature of Windhelm, itself. I also added 30 more scenes (NPC-NPC conversations) between them all. Voiced by 11labs AI.

Title: Lux - Patch Hub
Description: Patch collection for Lux, contains all needed patches since they're no longer hosted in Lux main page.

Title: Lightened Skyrim - Base Object Swapper edition
Description: Gain FPS across Skyrim with no visual difference! This is the version for Base Object Swapper.

Title: FB - Einherjr Armor 3BA-BHUNP
Description: New female immersive armor. High quality, modularity, many colors. Includes a set of new weapons: small axe, big two-handed axe and shield with 16 ornaments.

Title: Murder of Songbirds
Description: Utilizes Sound Record Distributor to play several varieties of bird (and bat) sounds throughout all regions of Skyrim. Including (but not limited to) hawks, crows, owls, seagulls, & woodpeckers.

Title: Animated Ships
Description: NPCs sail their ship through ports, beaches, and sea. Player can ride on them.

Title: Skyking Signs
Description: Skyking Signs offers all new meshes and textures for the shop and inn signs found throughout Skyrim. Signs will sway in the wind and respond more accordingly when hit. Their materials are set to wood as opposed to metal like the vanilla meshes.

Title: Ysmir Armor - My patches SE by Xtudo - Iron Steel Ancient Nord Ahzidal Kodlak Farkas Vilkas Ysgramor Hrongar SPID
Description: My patches and fixes for this amazing mod. Added support for beast races. Carried-on Unofficial Skyrim Patch fixes. Optional Vanilla Iron Armor replacer. ESL/ESP that will work with any Skyrim version.

Title: Blackreach Eerie Ambience
Description: Utilizes Sound Record Distributor to place eerie, ambient sounds in Blackreach. Optional Nirnroot Whisper included.

Title: SMP-NPC crash fix
Description: Fixes a random crash when loading NPCs with SMP hair.

Title: Dynamic Activation Key
Description: This mod enables different intuitive behaviors when pressing "Shift + Activate" (or the key you define). Also works on controllers. Used as a basis for many of my mods to enable contextual activations.

Title: SkyUI SE - Difficulty Persistence Fix
Description: Fixes SkyUI Gameplay settings menu in Skyrim v1.6.1130. Not compatible with older game versions.

Title: Open Animation Replacer - IED Conditions
Description: A SKSE64 plugin that adds new conditions to Open Animation Replacer for use with Immersive Equipment Displays and Simple Dual Sheath.

Title: Sky Reflection Fix
Description: SKSE plugin which fixes the sky in reflections.

Title: Improved Camera SE
Description: Improved Camera is an SKSE plugin that enables the 1st person body and allows for typically forced 3rd person animations also to be played in 1st person.

Title: Flame VFX Edit
Description: Improves vanilla fire spell effects!

Title: Modular SMP Hairstyles
Description: A semi-modular SMP hair mod: 100+ unisex hairstyle combinations, focusing on medium length styles.

Title: Player Character Gestures (OAR)
Description: mt_idle.hkx dynamic animation replacers to make your character gesture in dialogue with NPCs. Different gestures for friends and foes. Just OAR folders with animations, no plugin!

Title: Subtitles
Description: Subtitles. As in more than one. An SKSE plugin.

Title: Community Shaders
Description: Open-source SKSE core plugin for community-driven advanced graphics modifications for AE, SE and VR. Also fixes bugs.

Title: Trainwreck - A Crash Logger
Description: A general purpose crash logger compatible with all versions of the game past, present, and future, in perpetuity.

Title: Weapon Styles - Draw-Sheathe animations for IED
Description: Utilizing Open Animation Replacer, this mod will provide you with equip/unequip animations to be used with Immersive Equipment Displays.

Title: SSE Engine Fixes - Modified .toml File Only For SSE  v1.6.1130 and v1.6.1170
Description: This is a modified version of the .toml file that comes with SSE Engine Fixes (skse64 plugin) to allow it work with SSE v1.6.1130 and v1.6.1170, as well as GOG v1.6.1179.

Title: Comprehensive First Person Animation Overhaul - CFPAO
Description: Adds thousands (yes, I checked and it is actually in the thousands) of first person animations that overwrite the janky and outdated vanilla ones. Includes unique animations depending on weapon type (so axes, maces, and daggers are no longer used like swords). Does not require Nemesis or FNIS to work.

Title: Stacks of Septims - 3D Coin Piles - My patches SE by Xtudo
Description: Septim HD, JS Septims and Skyrim Coin Replacer Redux - Harald and Dumac patches.

Title: Cathedral - 3D Stonecrop
Description: A 3D replacer for the Tundra Scrub.

Title: Robes Retexture SE
Description: This mod retextures most Robes found in Skyrim. This includes all variants of the mage robes, archmage robes, priest robes, necromancer robes, greybeard robes, telvanni robes, temple priest robes, nocturnal robes, mythic dawn robes, psiijic robes, vagrant robes, and more. Textures only

Title: Quest Journal Fix for SkyUI
Description: Patches quest_journal.swf to work with the latest Skyrim version across multiple SkyUI skin mods, on top of making it so that the patched files work on any version.

Title: CBBE 3BA Vanilla Outfits Redone
Description: The most comprehensive conversion of all Vanilla (DLCs included) clothing and armor for CBBE 3BA body shape.

Title: Whales Off The Coast
Description: Uses Sound Record Distributor to play distant whale sounds while exploring coastal regions.

Title: JK's Fort Dawnguard
Description: An enhanced Fort Dawnguard Overhaul.

Title: Pyramid Utils
Description: Various utility functions for Papyrus.

Title: Base Object Swapper - Master Occlusion
Description: With many new "BOSified" mods, that do not disable references but simply move them down to -30000 Z... A mod is needed to make sure those are not rendered, and guarantee that the claims of performance gains are true. This is it.

Title: FSMPM - The FSMP MCM
Description: The FSMP MCM- Allows to configure FSMP through a MCM without going through the xml file- Allows to cast the FSMP console commands- Allows to load presets

Title: Animated Ships - Finer Sails
Description: A texture refinement designed to elevate the visual appeal of sails.

Title: Piercing Expert Spells
Description: New design for the vanilla Expert level spells!

Title: Dragon Mounds - Better Collision and Mesh Fixes
Description: Updated collision for Dragon Mounds

Title: Glass Armors and Weapons Retexture SE
Description: Retextures the Glass armor and weapons, Chillrend, CC Glass crossbow, CC glass staff, LOTD'S Glass bow of the stag prince and Grimsever, Oblivion Artifacts Pack's Quicksilver boots and Wyrmstooth Craftable Brimstone  Armors and weapons, Elsopa's Glass quiver. Also contains a patch for Cathedral Armor. Fixes mismatched cubemaps

Title: Pandorable's NPCs - males 3
Description: Another 60 male NPCs.

Title: Dual Casting Fix
Description: SKSE plugin that fixes a vanilla bug which causes the game to treat dual cast spells as if they were single cast.

Title: Arcs Tankard Redux
Description: Arcs Tankard Redux is a remesh and 4k texture overhaul for Skyrims Tankard, no esp

Title: First Person Animation Teleport Bug Fix
Description: Behavior patch that fixes a vanilla bug where starting certain interaction animations in first person teleports you to the start of the cell you were in. Clean, compatible, and lightweight.

Title: Kanjs - Beef Stew Animated
Description: I added remeshes and retextured The Beef Stew 4K with some animated motion, bubbles, heat smoke, and parallax textures, but they didn't seem to work for me.

Title: HDT-SMP Ysmir Armor Patch
Description: Added cloth physics and CBBE 3BA bodyslide to the Ysmir Armor.

Title: Distant Dragon Roars
Description: Simple mod utilizing Sound Record Distributor to take vanilla distant dragon roars and add them as ambient sounds to exterior regions.

Title: Rally's Upper Furniture
Description: Complete Overhaul of all Upper Furniture with New Textures, modified SMIM meshes, High Poly Pillows, 3D Rivets for handles and Table Cloth, Banners, Carpets and Drapes for Jorrvaskr.

Title: Open Animation Replacer - Dialogue Plugin
Description: Adds conditions related to dialogue to OAR.

Title: Lyssia -  A Visual Replacer
Description: My visual replacer for Lyssia follower! From AlmightySE work! Include 4 optional hairs!

Title: Face Sculptor Expanded
Description: Makes the Face Sculptor feel like an actual NPC that belongs in the world. New fully voiced scenes, new AI schedules, the removal of bounties when you change your face and more. Enjoy!

Title: SkyClimb
Description: SkyClimb brings a true climbing mechanic to Skyrim. Utilizing EVG Traversal's animations, SkyClimb uses techniques seen in modern games to allow you to realistically climb onto anything.

Title: Wandering Summoner outfit (3BA SMP)
Description: New outfit for your female mage

Title: Animated Ships  Patches
Description: No more Clipping ships from great Animated Ships mod.

Title: JK's Solitude Outskirts
Description: An enhanced Solitude outskirts overhaul.

Title: Kanjs - Spriggan Sap Animated
Description: I added remeshes and retextured The Spriggan Sap up to 4K with some animated motion and emissive light.

Title: Natural Waterfalls
Description: A complete locational overhaul of every waterfall in the Tamriel Worldspace.

Title: Cathedral - 3D Tundra Shrubs
Description: A 3D reproduction of all 10 vanilla tundra shrubs

Title: Open Animation Replacer - Detection Plugin
Description: Adds conditions related to detection of actors to OAR.

Title: JS Unique Utopia SE - Rings
Description: A complete remake of the unique Rings of Skyrim. Comes in 1k, 2k & 4k versions.

Title: TMD The Rift Leaves
Description: Leaves to The Rift.

Title: LoreRim - A Modern RPG Modlist
Description: LoreRim is a Wabbajack modlist utilizing an integration of mods such as Attack - MCO, Requiem and MUCH MUCH more. Most importantly, it makes Skyrim the game it should've been in 2011 with the visuals of today.

Title: JK's Windhelm Outskirts
Description: An enhanced Windhelm outskirts overhaul.

Title: ColdSun's Visions - Solvi - The Nord Heartbow Ranger
Description: A Nord Archer with High-Poly Head, custom perks, and custom skills. Uses my skin and your installed body. Compatible with 3BA, BHUNP, CBBE, TBD, and UNP. Vanilla FemaleEvenToned Voice or Custom Voice option.

Title: Vibrant Weapons EAE
Description: Particle-based VFX for Fire, Frost and Shock enchantments, now powered by the new Enchantment Art Extender. Faster, safer, better? Let's find out!

Title: Spell Knight Armors Retexture SE
Description: Retextures all 3 variants of the Spell Knight sets

Title: Snowy Ships for Snowy Regions
Description: This mod gets all longboats and large ships snowy in snowy environments. Base Object Swapper required.

Title: Light Limit Fix
Description: Community Shaders feature which makes dynamic lights unlimited, adds particle lights, contact shadows, shadows for first-person torches and light spells, and more. Supports SE, AE, and VR.

Title: Arcs Kitchen Redux 2k - 4k
Description: Arcs Kitchen Redux is a remesh and 4k texture overhaul for Skyrims Kitchen pots and ladle, no esp

Title: Brawl Lines Expansion and Fixes
Description: Fixes some issues with brawling dialogue, while also expanding it with new lines.

Title: Wheeler - Quick Action Wheel Of Skyrim
Description: Embeds a quick action wheel seamlessly into Skyrim's gameplay, providing a convenient interface for accurate and customized access and usage of spells, weapons, powers, shouts, potions, and poisons in the inventory.

Title: NPCs React To Frenzy
Description: This mod makes NPCs react to Frenzy/Fury/Mayhem spells. Enemies will be surprised to see their friends turning against them and will say fitting lines.

Title: Dragon Priests Retexture SE
Description: Retextures all dragon priest masks, Miraak, Cultists robes, Dragon priest weapons and all dragon priests. Contains and optional SPID addon to make every named dragon priest use custom textures. Contains optional retextures for Konahrik's Accoutrements, LOTD, Wyrmstooth and cloaks of skyrim. Patches for ICH, Stalhrim Refrozen and LOTD KA Displays

Title: JK's Riften Outskirts
Description: An enhanced Riften Outskirts overhaul.

Title: Shouting Provokes Dragons
Description: This mod attempts to provoke dragons to focus on the player, when the player uses a shout.

Title: Stagger Effect Fix
Description: SKSE plugin that fixes an engine bug with magic effects that caused targets to stagger in the wrong direction. Supports SE, AE and VR.

Title: Cheeky Kids
Description: Makes children run up to other NPCs and throw random insults at them, with appropriate responses. ESL flagged and very lightweight.

Title: dMenu
Description: A simple imGui Menu that does a little bit of everything

Title: Description Framework
Description: A framework for misc items to have a description in-game. This is useful for mods that add misc items, or if you want to add more flavour to the items from the base game.

Title: NPCs React To Invisibility
Description: You become invisible in front of people and no one bats an eye... Well, no more! With almost 300+ custom voiced reactions, NPCs will now react to both someone disappearing and someone materializing in front of them. Immersion!

Title: The Handy Icon Collection Collective
Description: The Handy Icon Collection Collective is a resource that provides icons for use with UI mods utilizing utilities such as I4 and C.O.C.K.S.

Title: Vanargand Animations II - Female Idle Walk And Run
Description: Complete remake of the Vanargand female idle walk and run. Both a no requirement replacer version and a "Conditional Armor Type Animations" version are provided.

Title: Dynamic Horse Petting Animations for Immersive Interactions
Description: New Horse Petting Animations for Immersive Interactions.

Title: Kanjs - Soup and Stew All In One Animated
Description: I added remeshes and retextured all the soup and stew, butter, and fondue up to 4K with some animated smoke and bubbles!

Title: JK's Markarth Outskirts
Description: An enhanced Markarth Outskirts overhaul.

Title: SkyPatcher
Description: SkyPatcher(also known as RobCo Patcher from Fallout 4), is a patcher based on SKSE and CommonLibSSE, which allows mod authors and users to modify game data without the use of plugins.You can modify ammos, npcs, races, weapons, modify leveled lists, formlists, containers and more. Easy and fast.

Title: Enchantment Art Extender
Description: SKSE Plugin that distributes new enchantment effects on weapons based on config files.

Title: Sprint Sneak Movement Speed Fix
Description: Fixes the game applying wrong movement speed if the character draws, sheathes or shouts while sprinting or sneaking. SKSE64 plugin.

Title: Elven Armors and Weapons Retexture SE
Description: Retextures the Elven Armor, shield and weapons, Thalmor robes, CC Elven hunter, CC Elven crossbow, Amidianborn content addon's Elven Thalmor armor and shield and Oblivion Artifacts Pack's Sinweaver, Calliben's Grim Retort, Witsplinter and Frostwyrm. Textures only except for Elven crossbow. Can be installed and uninstalled at any time

Title: Bethesda Plugin Manager for Mod Organizer
Description: Overhauls the Plugins panel in Mod Organizer with new functionality and tweaked visuals.
